question: What are the latest trends in technology adoption among companies in the manufacturing industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies within the manufacturing industry by querying the CompanyInfo table to filter based on the Industry column.
Gather technology adoption data by joining the CompanyInfo results with the CompanyTechStack table to get the technology details used by these companies.
Analyze the CompanyVendorProductDetail and CompanyVendorTechDetail tables to determine associated vendor products and technologies used by the identified manufacturing companies.
Compile insights into a structured format and identify key trends based on the data gathered about technology adoption among manufacturing companies.
